markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fluid Contortionist](/Feats.aspx?ID=2610) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Undine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=314" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 119 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can ignore difficult terrain caused by moving through tight spaces that aren't tight enough to force you to [Squeeze](/Actions.aspx?ID=31). When you roll a critical failure on a check to Squeeze, you get a failure instead, and when you roll a success, you get a critical success instead.
name: Fluid Contortionist
